name: gp-registrations-management-information
description: OpenAPI 3 API Definition for Template API

scripts.publish: openapi-generator-cli generate -i specification/gp-registrations-management-information.yaml --generator-key v3.0 -g openapi -o build && rm openapitools.json && mv build/openapi.json build/gp-registrations-management-information.json  && cp assets/index.html build/index.html

author: NHS Digital
